DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn obese person resistant develop obesity-related metabolic disease ( diabetes cardiovascular disease ) , others prone develop condition . We study obese person 5 % body weight gain . Subjects ask increase current diet period 8-12 week order increase current body weight 5 % . Each ask maintain weight increase 3 week . We monitor subject throughout time period weekly medical evaluation . At completion study , provide subject 6-month weight loss program .
DOC.criteria: Obese subject ( BMI 30.0 39.9 kg/m2 ) Sedentary subject ( exercise le 1 hr/wk ) Pregnant lactate woman Michigan Alcohol Screening Test score ≥4 Active previous history liver disease Active previous history diabetes history alcohol abuse , currently consume ≥20 g alcohol/day Severe hypertriglyceridemia ( > 300 mg/dL ) Smoke tobacco Take medication might confound study result
